entry.content:
å‰å›ã€è¨€èªå‡¦ç†100æœ¬ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ ã®01ã¾ã§ã‚„ã£ãŸã®ã§02ã‹ã‚‰ã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚

extern crate nlp100;

ã£ã¦ã‚„ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã« Cargo ã‚’ä½œæˆ cargo new nlp100

02. ã€Œãƒ‘ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ¼ã€+ã€Œã‚¿ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ¼ã€=ã€Œãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒˆã‚¯ã‚«ã‚·ãƒ¼ãƒ¼ã€

ã“ã‚Œã¯ãƒ ã‚ºã‚«ã‚·ã‚¤ã®ã§ç´ ç›´ã« zip ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹

```rust fn concat(t: (Vec, Vec)) {

let (f, s) = t;
let mut r = String::new();

for (x, y) in f.iter().zip(s.iter()) {
    r.push_str(&format!("{}{}", x, y));
}
println!("{}", r);

}

fn main() {

let p: Vec<char> = String::from("ãƒ‘ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ¼").chars().collect();
let t: Vec<char> = String::from("ã‚¿ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ¼").chars().collect();
let f = (p, t);
concat(f);

} ```

03. å††å‘¨ç‡

ã“ã®å•é¡Œã¯æ€ã„åˆ‡ã‚Šå‹˜é•ã„ã—ã¦ãŸã®ã§ã€ã€Œã“ã‚Œã®ã©ã“ãŒå††å‘¨ç‡ãªã®ï¼Ÿã€ã£ã¦æ€ã£ã¦ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã“ã„ã¤ã¯ Regex ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦å˜èªæ¯ã«åˆ†è§£ã€å˜èªæ¯ã«æ–‡å­—æ•°æ•°ãˆã¦è§£æ±ºã—ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚

```rust fn char_count_list(w: &str) –> Vec {

Regex::new(r"\W+").unwrap().split(w).map(|m| m.len()).collect()

}

fn main() {

let pi = char_count_list("Now I need a drink, alcoholic of course, after the heavy lectures involving quantum mechanics.");
println!("{:?}", pi);

} ```

04. å…ƒç´ è¨˜å·

ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€è‹±èªç‰ˆã€Œæ°´å…µãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ™ãƒ¼åƒ•ã®èˆ¹ã€ã§ã™ã®ã§æ¡ä»¶ã«åˆã†ã¨ãã ã‘1æ–‡å­—ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

```rust use std::collections::HashMap;

fn main() {

let atomic_words: Vec<&str> = "Hi He Lied Because Boron Could Not Oxidize Fluorine. New Nations Might Also Sign Peace Security Clause. Arthur King Can.".split(' ').collect();
let mut atomic_table = HashMap::new();
for (i, a) in atomic_words.iter().enumerate() {
    let chars = a.chars().map(|v| v.to_string()).collect::<Vec<String>>();
    let r = match i {
        0 | 4...8 | 14...15 | 18 => chars[0].to_string(),
        _ => chars[0..2].join(""),
    };
    atomic_table.insert(r, i + 1);
}

for (k, v) in &atomic_table {
    println!("{}: {}", k, v);
}

} ```
